#Text=Decorate an Apartment Office With Limited Space
#Text=Perhaps you ’re in a student apartment and stay up late at night finishing essays .
#Text=Or perhaps you ’re a young entrepreneur who works in their apartment in their pajamas .
#Text=Whatever you use your apartment office for , you do n’t want it to be boring , and you do n’t want to waste any space .
#Text=Use these apartment decorating ideas to ensure that you ’re apartment office is a comfortable , relaxing , and fun place to work .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Be careful with colour .
#Text=Dark colours will definitely make your room appear smaller .
#Text=Light neutral colours will give off the greatest appearance of space in your apartment office , but at the same time , they can get boring .
#Text=However , there are many fun colours out there , and you can always get them in a lighter shade .
#Text=Use large decorations
#Text=A lot of small decorations everywhere can give the appearance of clutter .
#Text=A few larger decorations , such as a large wall poster , can create wonderful focal points for your apartment office while opening the room up .
#Text=Keep your desk clean .
#Text=Whatever size desk you need for your apartment , keep it clean .
#Text=Do n’t add decorative clutter to it if you ’re goal is to open up space .
#Text=If you have a computer , try to hide as many wires as you can .
#Text=Use smart apartment storage .
#Text=Do n’t just leave everything out in your apartment office .
#Text=Look into trendy storage solutions to keep all your apartment clutter in a small space and out of the way .
#Text=If you have stuff that you traditionally keep in your apartment office but hardly ever use , consider storing it elsewhere in your apartment .
#Text=Use smart layout .
#Text=If you have a smaller apartment office , do not put your desk in the centre of the room .
#Text=Keep it in the corner , so that you have as much open space as possible .
#Text=Do n’t buy large plants .
#Text=A small cactus or other plant can give any room more life without taking up lots of space in your apartment .
#Text=Think of strategic ways to place it where it ’ll give the greatest illusion of lots of space ( as the only decoration in the centre of a large table , for example ) .
#Text=The trick is to contrast one small item with something much larger .
#Text=Only keep what you need .
#Text=Often apartment offices do n’t have a lot of space , even while the rest of the apartment does .
#Text=If this is the case , you might put a few office items in other places around your apartment .
#Text=If you do n’t print a lot but you own a printer , there ’s might be a place somewhere else in your apartment that ’s out of the way .
